attributes.title: Episode 123 "Flying Forward"
attributes.description:
It's a new year and a new episode of Frame Trap! Ben, Brad, and Huber discuss Cyberpunk 2077, Medal of Honor: Above and Beyond, Star Wars: Squadrons, Destiny 2: Beyond Light, and more!
To send an email to Frame Trap, the address is askeasyallies@gmail.com.

attributes.title: Episode 124 "A Monstrous Rise"
attributes.description:
Ben, Brad, and Brandon get speculative about Resident Evil and also discuss games such as Assassin's Creed Valhalla, the Monster Hunter Rise demo, and Ghost of Tsushima.
To send an email to Frame Trap, the address is askeasyallies@gmail.com.

attributes.title: Episode 125 "Haunting Assassinations"
attributes.description:
Game of the year may be over, but Frame Trap keeps on trucking with new releases including Hitman 3, Ys IX, The Medium, and more!
NOTE: Apologies for the video/audio getting slightly off sync at the end. It was a compromise I made to work around the weird and frustratingly confusing pops in Blood's audio that we haven't been able to solve. - Ben
To send an email to Frame Trap, the address is askeasyallies@gmail.com.

attributes.title: Episode 126 "Persona Strikes Back"
attributes.description:
The Valentine's Day spirit is in the air and it seems like Persona 5 Strikers has stolen Ben's heart. The panel also discusses Little Nightmares 2, Bowser's Fury, Terraria, and more.
To send an email to Frame Trap, the address is askeasyallies@gmail.com.
